Articles.Content:
Greetings to all of this forum.

During my ksp adventures i find myself wanting certain parts that no mod had created as of yet. I want to be able to create more creative rocket designs, which aren't in the wholy kerbal style of strapping on moar boosters.

Such part ideas include, radial, surface attached heat shields. Kinda like the curved solar panels from Near Future Solar. And maybe an upgraded version of the mk1-3 command pod, I would like to see one with more kerbals crammed in as the current internals allude to lots of space available.

 I had the idea for the upgraded mk1-3 from reading Eyes Turned Skyward.

So if any mod developer is up to do this i would we happy.

Thanks, I wait for a respose.
